body.name: Computer Keyboard Stand with Keyboard Wrist Rest, Acrylic Keyboard Riser Tilt for Desktop, Ergonomic Keyboard Holder with Wrist Pad for Office Home School, Comfortable Typing & Working

features: 【Keyboard Holder with Wrist Rest】 This computer keyboard stand made by high quality 4mm clear acrylic, sturdy and durable, smooth and polished finishes. Keyboard wrist rest are made of foam, superfine fiber, waterproof & breathable, which can improve hand and wrist posture, reduce joint and wrist problems and release your elbows and shoulder stress. Note: not recommended for slim keyboard.

【Ergonomic Design】This clear keyboard riser stand is designed of tilt and elevates the keyboard and holds keyboard at a comfortable angle. Use with keyboard wrist support, which can effectively relieving tension in the wrists, forearms, and elbows during prolonged periods of typing and sitting in front of the computer. Enhancing the comfort during long time of typing or gaming.

【Low Front Lip on The End】 keyboard riser tilt’s front Lip’s dimension is 1.76cm(0.69in), which can hold your keyboard perfectly, prevents keyboard from sliding and no contact with your hands when you are typing.You don't feel it while you're typing or gaming. A perfect keyboard accessories for desk company and gaming.

【Upgrade Anti-Slip】Silicone strip at the bottom back of acrylic keyboard stand is made of high quality silicone and prevents keyboard holder from sliding and protect your table, wrist pad bottom adopt Anti-slip pattern design, no worry about the sliding when you are typing or gaming.

【Perfectly Fit Various Keyboard】 keyboard stand for desktop ‘s size is 43*15*4cm(16.9*5.9*1.57in), wrist rest’s size is 43*9*1.8cm(16.9*3.54*0.71in), fits most standard keyboards: gaming keyboard/standard keyboard/full-sized keyboard and more. Perfect wrist & hand fatigue reliever for worker/gamer/writer who is engaged at long typing work.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Acrylic Computer Keyboard Stand with Wrist Rest is A Perfect Christmas Birthday Gifts for yourself/Friends/Family/Girl Friend!!! Acrylic Tilted Computer Keyboard Stand with Keyboard Wrist Rest Pad for Easy Ergonomic Typing for Office Desk, Home, School. Keyboard Stand is always your health partners! Ergonomic Design-Perfect angle and height for typing.Make typing more comfortable and easier.Soft Silicone Strip-The feet of the computer keyboard stand have soft silicone strips, which are non-slip and prevent scratches on the desktop.Prevent the keyboard from slipping-There are protrusions at the end of the computer keyboard stand, which can effectively prevent the keyboard from sliding down.Polished finishing, universal design which fits various size keyboards.Grade A top quality premium clear acrylic, durable and Sturdy.keyboard wrist rest-fully covered food grade silicone anti-slip base from bottom, refuse rubber strip.Angled for comfortable reading and typing, keeps you away from wrist issues.Low front lip on the end, won't collide your wrist for more comfortable typing.Sophisticated manufacturing process ensures smooth edges and corners.
Package Included: 1 * Acrylic Keyboard Holder1 * Keyboard Wrist Rest1 * box
Application in Multiple Scenarios & Compatible with Various Keyboard Sizes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product is great and worth the money. I love the wrist rest, it is very comfortable to use. The keyboard stand provides the perfect height and keyboard stays in place. I would definitely recommend this product to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely met my needs!
reviews.reviewText: This stand and wrist pad are perfect for my situation. I needed to elevate my keyboard and mouse over the buttons on my piano controller keyboard so I wouldn't keep accidentally pushing buttons on the music keyboard (see photo). The stand works perfectly! I can fit both my Mac keyboard and Apple Trackpad on it, and the additional wrist pad that comes with it makes it very comfortable to use for hours at a time. The price was excellent, and quality first rate! I highly recommend this stand and wrist pad!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard holder and wrist stand I purchased recently have significantly improved my typing experience. The product arrived new without any damage and scratches. The ergonomic design has reduced strain on my wrists and the adjustable height options make it comfortable to use for extended periods. Overall, I highly recommend it for anyone looking to enhance their workspace ergonomics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and durable
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly on my work desk. The foam pad it just the right thickness to help ease the discomfort of my wrist. Easy to clean also! Package arrived well put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very ergonomic & solid value
reviews.reviewText: This is a handy product, and completely changed in terms of comfort.I do a lot of typing with my hobbies and work. I had been wanting to upgrade my ergonomic game in a while, since my palms were getting tight and sore without any keyboard stand. This product gets the job done well for a great price.The only reason I would knock it down a star is that this keyboard isn't optimal for super thin keyboards. For thin keyboards, the bottom of the keyboard sinks below the "lip" and it's hard to access the space bar rows. However, this keyboard is great for thicker keyboards, including mechanical ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and sturdy! Made typing much more easy on my wrists and the padding helped ALOT! I had surgery on my wrist a year ago and typing is like a breeze now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does exactly what it needs to do
reviews.reviewText: My wrists started bothering me a few years ago. I have tried many keyboard variations to stave off surgery. The Kinesis split keyboard is stellar, I have a sit stand desktopper and taught myself to use the left hand tracker ball mouse . Total set up was great, but, still having issues with sore wrists. I saw this keyboard stand and was intrigued. I had to order 2 due to my split keyboard and needed to glue them down due to the narrowness of my sit-stand desktop. They work great, my wrist and thumb no longer hurt. I am so glad I purchased these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard stand is a great height for the keyboards we have at work. The pad makes it comfy to use
